archimate:Requirement.name: IR.1.2.3c: c) identify and prioritise the threats (e.g. nation states, inexperienced employees or fire/flood) and/or associated threat events (e.g. introduction of malware, user error or hardware malfunction) applicable to target environments (i.e. threat profiling)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
